name: TheSaia Rescue
description:
Rescue

Help Viking Saia save his family from the evil Hacker King Machal.

This is my first solo game, made with construct 3. This side project took me nearly a month. It's still pretty buggy and there is some stuff I got no idea how to resolve but I ran out of time. The sound and music selection aren't the best and some animation isn't what I have envision. I was unable to script it. Overall I'm still proud of it.

Thanks for playing <3

Check out my art: https://www.instagram.com/mehfruitsart
